  </script>
 </head>

        <path d="M0 12h45.422C79.732 12 108 38.697 108 72.998 108 107.301 79.568 134 45.422 134H0V12zm32.024 95.141h7.19c19.115 0 35.454-10.357 35.454-34.143 0-21.841-14.54-34.141-35.127-34.141h-7.517v68.284zM144 19.455c0 9.037-7.44 16.458-16.501 16.458-9.057 0-16.499-7.42-16.499-16.458C111 10.42 118.442 3 127.499 3 136.56 3.002 144 10.422 144 19.455zM142.22 134h-29.439V51.238h29.44V134zM244.998 126.557c0 35.226-17.7 49.443-48.67 49.443-19.34 0-45.23-9.856-47.853-31.67h33.428c.82 2.907 2.95 5.007 5.573 6.3 2.623 1.293 5.737 1.942 8.522 1.942 16.061 0 19.173-10.342 19.173-23.752v-3.879c-7.7 7.595-15.568 11.31-26.71 11.31-24.583 0-41.461-18.419-41.461-42.33C147 69.684 164.373 49 190.1 49c9.832 0 18.845 3.233 24.746 11.474h.327v-8.725H245v74.808h-.002zm-67.19-33.928c0 10.502 7.045 18.583 19.172 18.583s19.175-8.081 19.175-18.583c0-10.176-7.048-18.741-19.175-18.741s-19.171 8.565-19.171 18.741zM283 19.455c0 9.037-7.44 16.458-16.5 16.458-9.058 0-16.5-7.42-16.5-16.458C250 10.42 257.442 3 266.5 3c9.06 0 16.5 7.422 16.5 16.455zM281.22 134h-29.437V51.238h29.438V134zM330.935 135h-30.158V75.678H291V51.164h9.777V26h30.158v25.164H348v24.514h-17.065z">
        </path>
        <path d="M438 135.237h-29.827v-9.277h-.326c-5.246 8.294-15.57 12.04-25.402 12.04C357.535 138 340 117.337 340 93.42 340 69.505 357.21 49 382.116 49c9.67 0 19.83 3.581 26.057 10.902v-8.133H438v83.468zm-67.192-41.656c0 10.575 7.046 18.713 19.175 18.713 12.127 0 19.172-8.138 19.172-18.713 0-10.25-7.045-18.87-19.172-18.87-12.129 0-19.175 8.62-19.175 18.87zM475 134h-30V0h30zM576.192 43.5c-5.88-4.835-13.399-8.06-21.238-8.06-5.88 0-13.72 3.384-13.72 10.154 0 7.093 8.656 9.834 14.212 11.608l8.167 2.417C580.767 64.614 594 73.16 594 92.829c0 12.093-2.94 24.503-12.744 32.723-9.64 8.063-22.544 11.448-34.962 11.448-15.52 0-30.713-5.162-43.294-13.867l13.725-25.467c8.004 6.93 17.48 12.573 28.427 12.573 7.514 0 15.52-3.707 15.52-12.25 0-8.868-12.579-11.932-19.44-13.866-20.097-5.643-33.327-10.802-33.327-34.338C507.905 25.12 525.712 9 550.378 9c12.417 0 27.61 3.87 38.556 9.993l-12.742 24.506zM628.827 61.123h.326C634.563 52.881 644.72 49 654.555 49 679.629 49 697 69.685 697 93.436c0 23.916-17.207 43.948-42.116 43.948-9.67 0-19.669-3.393-26.057-10.665V176H599V51.75h29.827v9.373zm-.984 32.15c0 10.501 7.047 18.582 19.172 18.582 12.127 0 19.175-8.08 19.175-18.582 0-10.18-7.048-18.74-19.175-18.74-12.125 0-19.172 8.56-19.172 18.74z">
        </path>
        <path d="M686 52h34.19l22.3 42.408L764.304 52H798l-66.904 124h-33.21l28.49-52.568z">
        </path>
       </g>
      </svg>
     </a>

         <div class="custom-item falcon-winter-soldier-easter-eggs-deleted-scenes-kari-skogland column-stacked">

           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Features" data-vars-position="4" href="/tv/ustv/a35842403/falcon-winter-soldier-easter-eggs-deleted-scenes-kari-skogland/">

         <div class="custom-item-inner">

        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Big Story 7" data-vars-position="1" href="/soaps/hollyoaks/a35874634/hollyoaks-spoilers-george-felix-summer/">
          <img alt="hollyoaks week 12" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=640:* 640w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=980:* 980w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=1024:* 1024w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/hollyoaks-week-12-1615813541.jpg?crop=0.667xw:1.00xh;0.333xw,0&amp;resize=1120:* 1120w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="hollyoaks week 12"/>
         </a>
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <div class="custom-item-label item-label">
           <span>
            Features
           </span>
          </div>
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Big Story 7" data-vars-position="1" href="/soaps/hollyoaks/a35874634/hollyoaks-spoilers-george-felix-summer/">
           9 huge Hollyoaks spoilers for next week
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
           <p>
            What's next in the village?
           </p>
          </div>
          <span class="custom-item-meta">
           <!-- shared/byline -->
           <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            By
            <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
             Daniel Kilkelly
            </span>

      <div class="feed-block-column feed-block-column-middle">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-column-heading">
         <a href="https://www.digitalspy.com/tech/">
          Tech
         </a>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="29f388f1-d0e1-451b-95a8-91ba6b239263" data-vars-block-slot="9" data-vars-block-type="3 Column Block">
        <div class="custom-item life-is-strange-true-colors-trailer-release-date image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Tech" data-vars-position="1" href="/tech/a35891231/life-is-strange-true-colors-trailer-release-date/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/life-is-strange-true-colours-1616233899.png?crop=0.5366548042704626xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>

  <script id="deferred-css-script-tag">
   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/digitalspy/assets/css/homepage.0d054e6.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/digitalspy/assets/css/homepage-mobile.afd83b8.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>

window.CURRENT_LOCALE = {"id":"44cf84c8-9088-4c0d-9beb-325693957ef2","created_at":"2016-01-23T03:19:09.451000Z","updated_at":"2021-03-02T14:52:36.014702Z","name":"United Kingdom","language":"en","country":"GB","url_path":"uk","currency":"GBP"};
window.requiresGDPRConsent = ["celtra","facebook","giphy","instagram","pinterest","playbuzz","poll","quiz","spotify","tiktok","twitter","youtube"];
window.MOBILE_AD_PROGRESS_BAR = false;
window.SELF_HOSTED_ADS = false;



( function( d ) {
	const search = window.location.search;
	const ua = navigator.userAgent;
	if (~search.indexOf('disableTagManager') && (~ua.indexOf('Chrome-Lighthouse') || ~ua.indexOf('PTST')) ) return;
	const head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
	const s = document.createElement( "script" );
	s.async = true;

	
		window.GDPR_CONSENT_MODAL = function() {
				let oneTrustModalIsShowing = d.querySelector('#onetrust-banner-sdk') ? true : false;
		return oneTrustModalIsShowing;
	};

					var env = /docker|hearstapps/i.test(d.location.hostname) ? 'stage' : 'prod';

				var gdprCookieChoicesButton = d.querySelector('.ot-sdk-show-settings');
		var onetrust_pc_modal_event = new Event('onetrust_pc_modal');
		if (gdprCookieChoicesButton) {
			gdprCookieChoicesButton.addEventListener( 'click', function() {
				window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_pc_modal_event);
			}, false);
		}

						var onetrustCookieVal = d.cookie.match("[;]*\s*OptanonConsent\s*=\s*([^;]+)");

				window.GDPR_CONSENT_GROUPS = "";
		if (onetrustCookieVal) {
			try {
				var groups = onetrustCookieVal[1].match(/groups=(.*?)(&|$)/);
				if (groups) {
					groups = decodeURIComponent(groups[1]).split(",");
					for (var i = 0; i < groups.length; i++) {
						if (groups[i].split(":")[1] === "1") {
							window.GDPR_CONSENT_GROUPS += ((window.GDPR_CONSENT_GROUPS ? "," : "") + groups[i].split(":")[0]);
						}
					}
				}
			} catch(e) {}
		}

				var haveConsent = (/C0002|C0003|C0004|C0005/.test(window.GDPR_CONSENT_GROUPS)) ? true : false;

				var onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal = d.cookie.match("[;]*\s*OptanonAlertBoxClosed\s*=\s*([^;]+)");

				if (!haveConsent && onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal) window.GDPR_WITHDRAWN = true;

				var cookieTimestamp = 0;
		if (onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal) {
			var ds = new Date(onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal[1]);
			cookieTimestamp = ds.getTime();
		}

				if ( !haveConsent && (cookieTimestamp - (Date.now() - (1000 * 60 * 60 * 12)) ) < 0) {
						var cookieString = "OptanonAlertBoxClosed=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT;path=/;";
						if (env === 'prod') {
				var cookieDomain = window.location.hostname.replace("www","");
				cookieString += "domain=" + cookieDomain + ";";
			}
			d.cookie = cookieString;
		}

				function checkOtTextScroll(sel) {
			setTimeout(function() {
				var otp = d.querySelector(sel);
				if (otp && otp.scrollTop > 0) {
					otp.scrollTop = 0;
				}
			}, 250);
		}

				window.addEventListener('onetrust_modal', function() {
			checkOtTextScroll('#onetrust-policy');
		}, { once: true });

				window.addEventListener('onetrust_pc_modal', function() {
			checkOtTextScroll('#ot-pc-content');
		}, false);

				window.OptanonWrapper = function() {
						var haveCurrentConsent = /C0002|C0003|C0004|C0005/.test(OptanonActiveGroups);
			var onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal = d.cookie.match("[;]*\s*OptanonAlertBoxClosed\s*=\s*([^;]+)");

						var modalShowing = window.GDPR_CONSENT_MODAL();
			if (modalShowing) {
				if (!window.ga_modal_tracking){
					var onetrust_modal_event = new Event("onetrust_modal");
					window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_modal_event);
				}

								var gdprLearnMoreButton = d.querySelector('#onetrust-pc-btn-handler');
				if (gdprLearnMoreButton) {
					gdprLearnMoreButton.addEventListener( 'click', function() {
						window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_pc_modal_event);
					}, { once: true });
				}

			}

						if (haveCurrentConsent && !haveConsent) {
				var onetrust_accept_event = new Event("onetrust_accept");
				window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_accept_event);
				setTimeout(function(){ location.reload(); }, 300);
			}

						else if (haveConsent && !haveCurrentConsent) {
				var onetrust_reject_event = new Event("onetrust_reject");
				window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_reject_event);
				setTimeout(function(){ location.reload(); }, 300);
			}

									else if (onetrustAlertBoxCookieVal && !haveConsent && modalShowing) {
				var onetrust_reject_event = new Event("onetrust_reject");
				window.dispatchEvent(onetrust_reject_event);
				setTimeout(function(){ location.reload(); }, 300);
			}

		};

						
		(function loadOneTrust() {
			var domainId = 'aed7dc16-14b9-488d-9344-9576cb17e79e' + ((env === 'stage') ? '-test' : '');
			var s = d.createElement('script');
			s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.async = true;
			s.charset = 'UTF-8';
			s.src = 'https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js';
			s.setAttribute('data-domain-script', domainId);
			s.setAttribute('data-document-language', 'true');
			document.body.appendChild(s);
		})();

				if (haveConsent) {
			s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-uk/Bootstrap.js";
									window.GDPR_CONSENT = true;

		} else {
			s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-uk-dnt/Bootstrap.js";
					}

	
	if ( d.cookie.indexOf( "nsghtn=dev" ) > -1 ) {
		s.src = "//nexus.ensighten.com/hearst/mag-uk-dev/Bootstrap.js";
	}

			head.appendChild( s );
	} )( document );
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
